thread.title: Auburn recruiting podcast: Bruce Pearl snags latest big fish with Austin Wiley | AL.com
thread.title_full: Auburn recruiting podcast: Bruce Pearl snags latest big fish with Austin Wiley | AL.com

author: Drew Champlin | dchamplin@al.com
title: Auburn recruiting podcast: Bruce Pearl snags latest big fish with Austin Wiley | AL.com
text:
Austin Wiley isn't the first big recruit Bruce Pearl has gotten, but he may be the best.
The Spain Park junior center committed to Auburn over the weekend. On the first edition of Champ's Corner, Auburn recruiting edition, hosts Drew Champlin and Mark Jennings analyze the commitment while Mark gives his NBA comparison. Is he a better in-state prospect than DeMarcus Cousins?
There is plenty of football talk, as we rehash the weekend of visitors and if Auburn has a chance at the top recruits. We touch on Marlon Davidson 's commitment as well, and more.
Pay attention the last five minutes for the MLS Moment, where the hosts get into a Major League Soccer discussion focusing on the Portland Timbers and Sporting KC.
Listen to the audio below and leave a comment or question possibly for use on next week's podcast.
This podcast is powered by WarEagleSportsRadio as part of the VSporto network.
